content:
Following our meeting with the Nasdaq-listed logistics company, we need to focus on building a solid V1 that showcases our core capabilities. Key areas we need help with:

1. Real-time Monitoring System
- Track inventory movements
- Monitor shipment status
- Alert on anomalies

2. AI Decision Engine
- Optimize routing
- Predict demand patterns
- Automate order management

3. Integration Framework
- Connect with existing systems
- Handle data synchronization
- Maintain security standards

Can you help us design an architecture that scales while maintaining real-time performance?
